DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study evaluate clinical performance EQUÄ°A restoration material Class II cavity compare resin-based composite / dentin bonding system .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Evaluation Glass Ionomer Cement ( GIC ) Based Restorative System Versus Bulk Filled Resin-based Composite
DOC.detailed_description: 35 patient 12-year-old , match pair permanent molar approximal /or occlusal carious lesion similar size include . split -mouth design two restorative material use . After remove carious patient receive two restoration follow take impression determine cavity size . One two material Equia ( GC Europe N.V. , Leuven , Belgium ) , high viscosity glass ionomer cement second material use Tetric EvoCeram Bulk Fill composite ( IvoClar Vivadent ) , along dentin bonding system ( AdheSe One F , Ivoclar Vivadent , Lichtenstein ) . The dentist randomly select restorative material place . The dentist mix handle material , accordance manufacturer ' instruction . The clinician use matrix maintain tight adaptation restoration . The clinician take impression first set reaction material do determine wear restorative material . Two blind examiner involve placement restoration evaluate restoration six , 12 24 month . Impressions repeat 12 24 month interval . The examiner use U.S Public Health Service ( USPHS ) Ryge criterion evaluate restoration . Wear analysis perform 3 dimensional laser scan device ( Laserscan 3D , Willytec , Germany ) scan cast model . The data analyze use statistical software ( SPSS 13.0 , SPSS , Chicago ) . Cumulative survival rate estimate use Kaplan-Meier method long-rank-test .
DOC.criteria: Patients occlusal carious lesion mandibular molar teeth Patients extremely poor oral hygiene , severe chronic periodontitis , heavy bruxism habit exclude study
